values.value: Create and maintain a comprehensive inventory of all personal information collected, stored, and processed within Salesforce. CCPA requires organizations to know what personal information they hold to fulfill consumer disclosure and deletion requests.

Catalog all Salesforce objects and fields that contain personal information of California consumers, organized by CCPA data categories. Document data sources, retention periods, third-party sharing relationships, and business purposes for each data category. Implement a quarterly review process to keep the inventory current as new fields and integrations are added. Use the inventory to respond to consumer Right to Know requests within the 45-day deadline.
